"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/550bbfb76368725df5f00500#post_550bbfb76368725df5f00500
I've decided that since I've been watching a lot of Pretty cure lately, And I watched the original Dragon ball about a year ago, That I should watch DBZ.

I decided to skip everything leading up to the birth of the Super Saiyan and Skim the Rest of the Freiza saga. (Mainly because I watched DBZ up to the initial defeat of Captain Ginyu years ago) Which is why I'm past the defeat of Mecha Freiza already.

topics.body:
Today, I make a pledge here and you all shall be the witnesses!

During my college years, I shall write and draw a manga, showcase it at a convention and sell 100 copies!

That will be my stepping stone to my dream!

topics.body:
Well, that got weird.

Also, I visited a relative for a... party of sorts... Ehh...
Anyway, they had been giving out these white gelatin stuff as snacks.

Oh god, they tasted like medicine and they have a bitter aftertaste.
